question_stem:
The (red and white) wine quality datasets from the unsupervised learning topic have been merged into a single dataframe with 6497 rows. A decision tree classifier has been fit to the dataset as follows:

y = [1 if x=="red" else 0 for x in wine2.type]
X = wine2.iloc[:, 0:11]
X_train,X_test,y_train,y_test = train_test_split(X, y, test_size=0.2, random_state=14, stratify=y)

clf = tree.DecisionTreeClassifier(max_depth=4)
clf.fit(X_train, y_train)

y_pred_train = clf.predict(X_train)
ConfusionMatrixDisplay.from_predictions(y_train, y_pred_train, labels=clf.classes_, cmap='bone');

Compute the following metrics for the white wine category, to 3 d.p.:
• precision: ______(1)______
• recall: ______(2)______
• accuracy: ______(3)______
